article.title: November 2017 Galaxy News
article.tease: Galactic Blog launches, new events, pubs, tools, ...
article.content:
The November 2017 Galaxy News is out!

  • The Galactic Blog takes off

  • Publications:

    • The Galaxy Pub library surpasses 5,000 publications
    • 110 new pubs added in October, including 5 highlighted pubs

  • Upcoming events (9 this month)

    • Galaxy (and GMOD) at PAG XXVI

      • PAG Early registration ends today.

  • Public Galaxy Server News

    • 33 pubs in October using, referencing or about public Galaxy servers
    • Citations section added to public server list
    • New public server: BF2I-MAP
    • And the Language Analysis Portal too
  • ToolShed contributions
  • New releases of StarForge and sequence_utils.

And Other news too.

See the full newsletter.
